name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
Results-oriented Senior Java Engineer with 8 years of comprehensive experience in designing and implementing high-performance SaaS solutions. Proficient in **Java**, **Spring**, and modern frameworks such as **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, and **ReactJS**. Expert in microservices architecture, event-driven systems, and building scalable applications optimized for the cloud. Significant hands-on experience in CI/CD pipelines, DevOps practices, and containerization technologies.

Skilled in developing user-friendly UI/UX interfaces, utilizing advanced state management techniques like **Redux** and **Context API**. In my previous roles, I have successfully integrated systems that adhere to strict compliance standards including HIPAA and PCI DSS, while also implementing best practices in system architecture and security. My background also encompasses full-stack development, allowing me to bring a holistic view to projects, ensuring smooth collaboration between frontend and backend teams.

experience.responsibilities:

• Architected and deployed **microservices**-based solutions and **SaaS** products, ensuring event-driven and domain-driven design principles.
• Implemented robust **DevOps** practices, establishing **CI/CD** pipelines with tools like GitHub Actions, Azure DevOps, and CircleCI for smooth deployment processes across multiple environments.
• Enhanced user experience by collaborating with UI/UX teams and implementing responsive front-end solutions using **TypeScript**, **ReactJS**, and **Redux** for state management.
• Designed and optimized architecture for scalable systems by leveraging **containerization** technologies such as **Docker** and **Kubernetes** for improved application deployment and management.
• Actively participated in the design and execution of test strategies using frameworks such as **Jest**, **Cypress**, and **Postman**, achieving a test coverage of over **90%** across applications.
• Utilized project management methodologies to ensure timely completion of developments, tracking progress with metrics and ensuring compliance with best practices in software development.
• Collaborated with cross-functional teams to align on objectives and resolve issues quickly, improving the overall system performance by **30%**.
• Delivered ongoing product enhancements and support, maintaining an uptime of **99.9%**, and a response time of under **200ms** for all microservice endpoints.
• Monitored application performance and reliability, utilizing analytics tools to ensure operational KPIs are met and exceeded for both user engagement and transaction efficiency.

Utilized **Java** and **Spring** frameworks to design and implement microservices architecture, enhancing scalability and maintainability for high-traffic financial platforms.
Focused on developing robust APIs that facilitate seamless integration with front-end technologies including **JavaScript** and **TypeScript**, ensuring responsive functionalities in user interfaces.
